item.title: Stages of JavaScript grief
item.description: This is one of my favourite blog posts of all time. It is no longer published, but I found it on the wayback machine (internet archive). I am reposting it here for your enjoyment. I hope the original author doesn't mind. Originally by By Dan Lee, 9 September 2010. The typical beginning of an Enterprise Developerâ€™s JavaScript education is involuntary in nature. In many cases an engineer with a strong background in Java, or other strongly-typed languages, is informed that their next project requires JavaScript.
